description.title: Sales Copy/Content that Converts
description: $8/hr   ·   Starting at $25

Content. That Converts I take the goal of your end game, and work backwards from there – you tell me about your business objective, and I create content that leads to tangible pence, pounds, and profi…

commnet: for Native writers for repeat work

bio:
What's the first thing a reader sees when he or she starts reading your article, book, or piece of writing in general? You might think, "How well it is punctuated, or how well it is worded," and you wouldn't be too far away from the truth. However, clarity, flow, and crispness beat simple mechanics any day of the week and twice on Sundays. 

If you want to add that polish to your writing, look no further. 

Key attributes: 

- Time management: impeccable at meeting deadlines 
- Effective communication skills 
- Unbiased work ethics 
- Wild imagination: ability to conjure up chromatic illustrations with immersive vivification of even the simplest stories. I never write in this way, it's just for show! The rich vocabulary and fancy-looking words have their place, but not if they make the piece look like a Christmas tree without the actual tree :)

My writing achieves results. Proven results. That’s why I say, ‘When you want the best, hire from the Top!’

Content / Article writing: Expressing your ideas, and thoughts and promoting your company is done with perfect bilingual English skills. A wordsmith is what you should be seeking. Remember, this is seriously not everyone's cup of tea. 

Tech/ Casino Content: With over 5 years of experience working with different clients, I have the zen factor about the technology world and all of it. If you are looking for a skilled worker, I'm the right person for that. 

Shoot me an email today and let's see how I can help your business grow.
